name: Eternal Horror
description:
Eternal Horror is a survival horror shooter game. You must traverse each level to find the exit while attempting to survive the horrors within. Exploring for health is encouraged, as it is your means of surviving your encounters with the horrors. Sometimes running from encounters or backtracking is your best option for survival. You will inevitably die at times.

Controls

ActionKeyMouse ButtonMove ForwardwMove BackwardsStrafe LeftaStrafe RightdTurn Left*left arrowTurn Right*right arrowAttackleft controlleft**RestartenterQuitescape

*The mouse can also be used to turn

**Hold down the left mouse button

Scaling

The game window can be scaled by running the game executable from the command line and including the -scale argument with one of the following values.

ValueResolution164x642128x1284256x2568512x512
